title: President adminisrates oath of Chairman FPSC to Captain (retd) Shahid Ashraf Tarrar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Thursday administered oath to Captain (retd) Shahid Ashraf Tarrar as Chairman Federal Public Service Commission (FPSC).
The swearing-in ceremony was held here at the Aiwan-e-Sadr.
The president administered the oath in line with clause (2) of the Article 203C of the Constitution.
